Name: Chip's Challenge 2
About the game: When we last left our hero 25 years ago, Chip McCallahan had won the heart of Melinda the Mental Marvel and they were celebrating together at the Bit Busters annual eprom. Now a new challenge has been issued by the International Brain Game Club. As the two best Bit Busters, Chip and Melinda have a fresh set of levels to beat together, which have been created by Vladimir Gerajkee the Puzzle Master from a combination of new & old monsters, hazards and game elements: 200 new Levels Play as Chip & Melinda 79 additional game elements, abilities & monsters Can you help Chip & Melinda complete the International Brain Game Club challenge? If you can't, no one can!
